ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Zartan spars against Dawn and tries to throw her off-balance by dredging up Snake Eyes' memories inside her, but this only reminds Dawn how Zartan killed the Hard Master and she delivers a near-fatal stab wound to Zartan's chest. Storm Shadow fears Dawn has become a remorseless killer because of Zartan's toying with her.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 16:53:08. [CVDB588455] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:19. [Issue ID 1683841]
ComicInfo.Colorist: James Brown (J. Brown),James Offredi,Juan Fernandez,J. Brown
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),James Offredi,John Royale,Juan Fernandez,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Snake Eyes [Sean Collins],Hard Master (flashback),Granny Demon [Obake Obaasan],Storm Shadow,Dawn Moreno,Snake Eyes (flashback),Zartan,Stalker (flashback)
